pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, June 20, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, June 20, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 1:00 p.m.


Toronto, Ontario

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Canada-Ukraine Business Forum.

The Toronto Congress Centre
650 Dixon Road
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 3:15 p.m.
  • Photo opportunity
  • Open coverage for remarks


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
